snippet.title: Baptiste - Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2922250/Baptiste
Wishlist now on PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10013181

Devastated by a family tragedy, Sara and her son, Tom, seek a new start at Jagged Shore Cliff, a remote cliff in the United Kingdom. However, their worst fear is waiting for them there. In their new and mysterious home, a dusty cabinet holds Baptiste, an unsettling doll accompanied by an ominous warning: “Never release this from its glass prison.” 

#horrorgaming #horrorshorts #halloween
